commentList.content: 體驗非常好的酒店，服務很好，主要是位置實在是太便利啦，非常喜歡，兩個前台小姐姐也非常好，非常可愛，非常喜歡。
commentList.translatedContent: The hotel experience is very good, the service is very good, the main reason is that the location is really convenient, I like it very much, and the two ladies at the front desk are also very good, very cute, and I like it very much.

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的賓客您好，感謝您對CitiGO的喜歡和支持，CitiGO由國際知名設計師親自執筆設計，打造集“社區共享式大堂、輕生活方式、智能化客控”為一體的新概念空間。酒店始終致力於為您帶來高品質的入住體驗，期待您的再次入住!

commentList.content: 酒店出行超方便，前台小姐姐也超級好超級熱情。
commentList.translatedContent: The hotel is super convenient to travel, and the lady at the front desk is also super nice and enthusiastic.

feedbackList.content: 感謝您選擇北京天安門廣場CitiGO歡閣酒店並在此留下您的入住感受。酒店的設計和服務都是為了讓我們的客人在旅途中保持舒適的狀態。我們會繼續努力，為每位客人提供更加貼心的服務，期待您的再次入住！

commentList.content: 雖然是雙層複式 感覺房間還是有点小  比較壓抑 優点是房間有兩台大電視  還有兩間衞浴 若是同行家人多一點是挺方便的 離地鐵站跟核酸檢測点都很近  房間外面一樓走道有点異味  酒店房間提供免費可樂飲品孩子喜歡  晚上10点還提供免費夜宵 一人可以有一小碗餛飩 離大柵欄挺近的
commentList.translatedContent: Although it is a double-storey duplex, the room is still a bit small and relatively depressing. The advantage is that the room has two large TVs and two bathrooms. If you have more family members, it is very convenient. It is very close to the subway station and the nucleic acid testing point. The corridor on the first floor outside the room A little peculiar smell The hotel room provides free cola drinks. Children like it at 10 o'clock in the evening and also provide free supper for one person. You can have a small bowl of wontons. It's very close to Dashilan.

commentList.content: 可能是因為春節期間去的吧，1200的房價，房間小不說，設施也不行，就連早餐都不夠。不到9點鐘去的，已經沒啥吃的了，前邊客人留下的餐盤也沒有人收拾。住了一天果斷離開。
commentList.translatedContent: Maybe it's because I went there during the Spring Festival. The house price is 1200, not to mention the small room, the facilities are not good, even the breakfast is not enough. I went before 9 o'clock, and there was nothing to eat, and no one cleaned up the plates left by the previous guests. Stayed for one day and left decisively.

feedbackList.content: 抱歉給您帶來不好的入住體驗，CitiGO重視每一位客人提出的意見和建議，感謝您的信任和指正。我們一定會不斷反思和改進，為大家創造更好的入住體驗。
feedbackList.translatedContent: I am sorry to bring you a bad check-in experience. CitiGO values the opinions and suggestions of every guest. Thank you for your trust and corrections. We will continue to reflect and improve to create a better check-in experience for everyone.

commentList.content: 離景區很近，看升旗，去故宮走路即可到，很方便

feedbackList.content: 感謝您對CitiGO的信任和喜歡。一個人的朝九晚五，不如一羣人的歡樂場。希望酒店豐富而強大的共享客廳，給您帶來更多美好的體驗，期待您的每一次入住！

commentList.content: 房間雖然不大但是設計的很好，北京寸土寸金房間都不算大，但該有的都有，而且都是衹能的。床品也很舒服。位置就不用說了，地鐵特別近，就在前門大街上，還可以步行去天安門。
commentList.translatedContent: Although the room is not big, the design is very good. The rooms in Beijing are not big, but they have everything, and they are only available. The bedding is also very comfortable. Needless to say the location, the subway is very close, on Qianmen Street, you can also walk to Tiananmen Square.

commentList.content: 交通很方便，珠市口地鐵站出來走幾步就是，酒店在步行街上，旁邊有羅森和luckin，網上提前訂會便宜點，看這幾天價格都翻倍了。兩大一小住的1.8大床景觀房，屋內空間不大，但是東西都有，外出玩一天晚上睡睡覺足夠啦，下次去北京還會考慮這家酒店。
commentList.translatedContent: The transportation is very convenient. Zhushikou Subway Station is just a few steps away. The hotel is on the pedestrian street, next to Lawson and Luckin. It will be cheaper to book in advance online. The price has doubled these days. There is a 1.8-bed view room with two big beds and one small room. There is not much space in the room, but it has everything. It is enough to go out and play for a night and sleep well. I will consider this hotel next time I go to Beijing.

feedbackList.content: 最好的旅行，就是在一個陌生的地方，發現一種久違的感動。從親的話語裏小C感到好溫暖
feedbackList.translatedContent: The best travel is to find a long-lost feeling in a strange place. Little C feels so warm from the dear words

commentList.content:
新年帶娃出行，選的是CITIGO天安門廣場店。
1）酒店位置——地理位置非常好。在前門大街的一端，距離珠市口地鐵站非常近，在北京的五天基本都是地鐵出行。新年期間各家餐廳爆滿，我們可以先去取號，隨後回酒店休息，晚點再去餐廳。這一點就非常適合有娃又要休息的家庭。步行去天安門也非常方便。酒店隔壁就是24小時便利店，買買東西什麼也很便利。
2）酒店設施—酒店好像是民宅改建，隔音非常不好。基本上隔壁聊天打電話聽的一清二楚。淺眠者入住前最好問一下酒店隔壁有沒有人住。
3）酒店衛生—坦白說，衛生衹能用過得去形容。可能是因為新年期間人手不足吧，下水道味道有點大。大家相互包容一下就過去了。
4）酒店早餐—因為訂酒店之前參考了一些其他住客的評價，對於早餐有一些顧慮。實際上新年期間的人手短缺的確影響了早餐。前台小姐姐要負責前台入住，要收拾餐桌，要及時補餐等等工作。真的是手忙腳亂。早餐衹能說能吃飽，額外加一份早餐是69元。
commentList.translatedContent:
When traveling with a baby in the New Year, I chose the CITIGO Tiananmen Square store.
1) Hotel location - the location is very good. At one end of Qianmen Street, it is very close to the Zhushikou subway station, and the five days in Beijing are basically subway travel. During the New Year, the restaurants are full. We can go to get the number first, then go back to the hotel to rest, and go to the restaurant later. This is very suitable for families with children who want to rest. It is also very convenient to walk to Tiananmen Square. There is a 24-hour convenience store next door to the hotel, which is very convenient for shopping.
2) Hotel facilities - the hotel seems to be remodeled from a private house, and the sound insulation is very poor. Basically, you can clearly hear the chatting and calling next door. Light sleepers had better ask if there is anyone living next door to the hotel before checking in.
3) Cleanliness of the hotel - frankly, cleanliness can only be described as passable. It may be due to the shortage of staff during the New Year, and the sewer smell is a bit strong. Everyone tolerated each other and it passed.
4) Hotel breakfast - because I referred to some other guests' comments before booking the hotel, I have some concerns about breakfast. In fact the shortage of staff during the new year did affect the breakfast. The lady at the front desk is responsible for checking in at the front desk, cleaning the dining table, making up meals in time, and so on. Really busy. Breakfast can only be said to be full, and an extra breakfast is 69 yuan.

feedbackList.content: 感謝您選擇北京天安門廣場CitiGO歡閣酒店並在此留下您的入住感受。酒店的設計和服務都是為了讓我們的客人在旅途中保持舒適的狀態。我們會繼續努力，為每位客人提供更加貼心的服務，期待您的再次入住！

commentList.content: 位置優越交通便利，周邊旅遊景點特別多，好吃的特別多，酒店門口就是地鐵站，出門就走到了。酒店設施齊全，房間乾淨整潔，住的很舒服。前台人員服務都很好，很主動，熱情。早餐非常好，品種多，晚間還有夜宵服務，個人覺得性價比蠻高。房間設施齊全，服務人員素質高，房間設施新，床品舒服，總體物超所值，是一次非常滿意的體驗。
commentList.translatedContent: The location is superior, the transportation is convenient, there are many tourist attractions around, and there are many delicious food. There is a subway station in front of the hotel, and you can walk there. The hotel has complete facilities, the rooms are clean and tidy, and the stay is very comfortable. The front desk staff are very good, very active and enthusiastic. The breakfast is very good, there are many varieties, and there is a late-night snack service in the evening. Personally, I think the cost performance is quite high. The room facilities are complete, the service staff are of high quality, the room facilities are new, the bedding is comfortable, and the overall value for money is a very satisfactory experience.

commentList.content: 這次選的酒店真的是太棒了，剛到酒店門口，前台的工作人員就過來幫忙開門，全程服務很熱情，態度真的很好，還送了香囊，有點小驚喜，前台的小姐姐還告訴有免費的夜宵和咖啡，真不錯，房間也很好，滿意！
commentList.translatedContent: The hotel I chose this time is really great. As soon as I arrived at the door of the hotel, the staff at the front desk came to help open the door. The whole service was very enthusiastic and the attitude was really good. I also gave a sachet, which was a little surprise. My sister also told me that there are free supper and coffee, which is really good, the room is also very good, I am satisfied!

feedbackList.content: 感謝您選擇北京前門CitiGO歡閣酒店並在此留下您的入住感受，CitiGO位於前門大街112號，周邊小吃眾多，CitiGO是華住酒店集團旗下輕奢、社交品牌,我們致力於將睡眠和沐浴做到極致，在客房採用德國漢斯格雅、杜拉維特的衛浴設備，強大的智能電視等設備確保您的舒適體驗。從洗浴設施到床墊用的都是國際知名品牌，您還可以隨時隨地感受智能客控系統的方便與快捷；我們提倡房間衹是休息的地方，其餘的時間都交給我們的公共區域，在這裏，濃厚的社交氛圍會讓您找到更多興趣相投的朋友，融入狂歡。酒店全體員工非常期待與您的再次相遇，讓我們一起在CitiGO留下最美好的一段回憶！
feedbackList.translatedContent: Thank you for choosing CitiGO Huange Hotel Qianmen Beijing and leave your stay here. CitiGO is located at No. 112 Qianmen Street, and there are many snacks around. CitiGO is a light luxury and social brand under Huazhu Hotel Group. We are committed to combining sleep and bathing. To achieve the ultimate, in the guest room, the bathroom equipment from German Hansgrohe and Duravit, powerful smart TV and other equipment are used to ensure your comfortable experience. From bathing facilities to mattresses, they are all internationally renowned brands. You can also feel the convenience and speed of the intelligent guest control system anytime, anywhere; we advocate that the room is only a place to rest, and the rest of the time is left to our public area, here , the strong social atmosphere will allow you to find more friends with similar interests and join in the carnival. All the staff of the hotel are very much looking forward to meeting you again. Let's leave the best memories together in CitiGO!

commentList.content: 酒店在新建設的前門大街南端，不遠就是7/8號地鐵線A站口，位置是不錯的。酒店是歐洲較流行的小但是精緻城市酒店布置。房間是很小的，但設施用的還是好牌子，漢斯格雅的水龍頭，杜拉維特的坐便器。床墊比較軟，我是喜歡軟的。北京到處不讓外來客人出去，他家還比較人性，不額外製造麻煩。
commentList.translatedContent: The hotel is at the southern end of the newly built Qianmen Street, not far from Station A of Metro Line 7/8. The location is good. The hotel is a small but exquisite urban hotel layout that is more popular in Europe. The room is small, but the facilities are still of good brands, Hansgrohe faucets, Duravit toilets. The mattress is relatively soft, I like soft. Foreign guests are not allowed to go out everywhere in Beijing. His family is more humane and does not cause extra trouble.

feedbackList.content: 感謝您選擇北京天安門廣場CitiGO歡閣酒店並在此留下您的入住感受，和我們一起感受鬧中取靜、大隱隱於市的寧靜安然，祝君諸事順遂！
feedbackList.translatedContent: Thank you for choosing CitiGO Huange Hotel Beijing Tiananmen Square and leave your stay experience here. Come with us to feel the tranquility in the middle of the bustle and the tranquility hidden in the city. I wish you all the best!

commentList.content:
一直很喜歡citigo的風格 這次為了看歐冠訂了一間大床房 整體體驗很不錯 一進門的花牆也很好看 唯一的缺點就是桌子太髒了
希望疫情之後早點恢復brunch啊
commentList.translatedContent:
I have always liked the style of citigo. This time, I booked a big bed room to watch the Champions League. The overall experience is very good. The flower wall at the door is also very beautiful. The only disadvantage is that the table is too dirty.
I hope brunch will resume soon after the epidemic.

feedbackList.content: 抱歉給您帶來不好的入住體驗，CitiGO重視每一位客人提出的意見和建議，感謝您的信任和指正。我們一定會不斷反思和改進，為大家創造更好的入住體驗。

commentList.content:
非常非常驚喜！
這可以說我近十幾年來旅遊或者出差遇到的最好的酒店，沒有之一。
酒店就在前門天街上，無論是去天安門廣場，還是看升旗，或者逛街吃東西都特別方便。
裏面的設施非常新，很智能。
個人認為更加重要的是，前台的小哥哥小姐姐們太細心了，營造了一個很溫馨的環境。
令人驚喜的是，即便在北京疫情期間，每天晚上還有宵夜。
點贊，等假期的時候一定帶着小朋友們再來。
commentList.translatedContent:
Very very surprised!
This can be said to be the best hotel I have come across in the past ten years or so on a business trip.
The hotel is located on Qianmen Tianjie. It is very convenient to go to Tiananmen Square, to watch the flag raising, or to go shopping and eat.
The facilities inside are very new and smart.
Personally, I think it is more important that the little brothers and sisters at the front desk are too attentive and create a very warm environment.
Surprisingly, even during the epidemic in Beijing, there was a late-night snack every night.
Like it, I will definitely come back with the children during the holidays.

commentList.content: 非常棒，入住感受很給力，就在前門大街門口，出門方便，門口有很多商店，早上散散步，晚上溜溜彎的最佳去處
commentList.translatedContent: Very good, the experience of staying is very powerful, just at the entrance of Qianmen Street, it is convenient to go out, there are many shops at the door, the best place for a walk in the morning and a yo-yo bend in the evening

commentList.translatedContent: There are many hotels and the location is very convenient! great breakfast

commentList.content: 服務非常熱情，前台小姐姐都特別好，幾乎是有求必應，房間衛生乾淨，智能化客控系統很先進，酒店位置很好就在前門大街，還有機器人給送餐，非常方便。推薦體驗！
commentList.translatedContent: The service is very friendly, the ladies at the front desk are very good, almost everything is needed, the rooms are clean, and the intelligent guest control system is very advanced. Recommended experience!

feedbackList.content: 感謝您選擇北京前門CitiGO歡閣酒店並在此留下您的入住感受，CitiGO位於前門大街112號，周邊小吃眾多，CitiGO是華住酒店集團旗下輕奢、社交品牌,我們致力於將睡眠和沐浴做到極致，在客房採用德國漢斯格雅、杜拉維特的衛浴設備，強大的智能電視等設備確保您的舒適體驗。從洗浴設施到床墊用的都是國際知名品牌，您還可以隨時隨地感受智能客控系統的方便與快捷；我們提倡房間衹是休息的地方，其餘的時間都交給我們的公共區域，在這裏，濃厚的社交氛圍會讓您找到更多興趣相投的朋友，融入狂歡。酒店全體員工非常期待與您的再次相遇，讓我們一起在CitiGO留下最美好的一段回憶！

commentList.content: 環境不錯，我覺的在快捷酒店裡算設計比較好的了，不土，比其他快捷好看，很多設計比較人性化，還有手機支架，出熱水速度也很快，有點五星級那種三秒出熱水的意思
commentList.translatedContent: The environment is good. I think the design is better in the fast hotel. It is not dirty, and it looks better than other fast hotels. Many designs are more user-friendly, and there is a mobile phone holder. The hot water is also very fast. It is a bit like a five-star hotel. Hot water comes out in three seconds

feedbackList.content: 感謝您選擇北京天安門廣場CitiGO歡閣酒店並在此留下您的入住感受。酒店的設計和服務都是為了讓我們的客人在旅途中保持舒適的狀態。我們會繼續努力，為每位客人提供更加貼心的服務，期待您的再次入住！
feedbackList.translatedContent: Thank you for choosing CitiGO Hotel Beijing Tiananmen Square and leaving your experience here. The hotel's design and services are all about keeping our guests comfortable during their travels. We will continue to work hard to provide each guest with more considerate service and look forward to your stay again!

commentList.content: 前台非常棒，有很舒適廣闊的區域提供休閑和辦公，而且不僅環境很好而且服務周到，以及還有優質的自助早餐。房間內布局比較商務且很現代化，不得不說比同等價格的酒店性價比要高很多。 另外，非常感謝前台姓王的小姐姐，態度非常熱情和周到，每次點外賣都幫我送上樓，超級感謝！
commentList.translatedContent: The front desk is very good, there is a very comfortable and spacious area for leisure and work, and not only is the environment very good and the service is thoughtful, and there is also a high-quality buffet breakfast. The layout of the room is relatively business and modern, and I have to say that it is much more cost-effective than hotels of the same price. In addition, I am very grateful to the lady at the front desk surnamed Wang, who has a very warm and thoughtful attitude. Every time I order takeaway, she helps me take it upstairs. Thank you very much!

feedbackList.content: 感謝您對CitiGO的信任和喜歡。一個人的朝九晚五，不如一羣人的歡樂場。希望酒店豐富而強大的共享客廳，給您帶來更多美好的體驗，期待您的每一次入住！
feedbackList.translatedContent: Thank you for trusting and liking CitiGO. A person's nine-to-five is not as good as a group of people's joy field. I hope that the rich and powerful shared living room of the hotel will bring you more wonderful experiences and look forward to your every stay!

commentList.content: 服務人員態度親切，內部環境衛生，裝潢風格奢華穩重。下次來北京還是會入住這家酒店。
commentList.translatedContent: The service staff are friendly, the internal environment is hygienic, and the decoration style is luxurious and stable. I will still stay at this hotel next time I come to Beijing.

feedbackList.content: 感謝您選擇北京天安門廣場CitiGO歡閣酒店並在此留下您的入住感受。酒店的設計和服務都是為了讓我們的客人在旅途中保持舒適的狀態。我們會繼續努力，為每位客人提供更加貼心的服務，期待您的再次入住！

We will continue to work hard to provide each guest with more considerate service and look forward to your stay again!

commentList.content: 這裏目前是住過的賓館裏面體驗最好的。不僅是前台服務、衛生、還是舒適程度都很棒，性價比很高。賓館裏面有咖啡廳、自習室、樂器、還有國際象棋五子棋等等，就算在大廳裏坐一下午都不會無聊～體驗感滿分！
commentList.translatedContent: This is by far the best experience I've ever stayed in a hotel. Not only the front desk service, hygiene, but also the comfort level are great, and the price is very high. There are cafes, study rooms, musical instruments, and chess and backgammon in the hotel. Even if you sit in the lobby for an afternoon, you will not be bored ~ the experience is full!

commentList.content:
1.入住辦理非常慢 前台業務不熟練
2.房間非常狹窄 通風不好 還有刺鼻的異味
3.房間衛生不好 床單上有頭髮
4.酒店外觀和大堂與客房品質和服務不匹配
commentList.translatedContent:
1. Check-in is very slow and the front desk business is not skilled
2. The room is very narrow, the ventilation is not good and there is a pungent odor
3. The room is not hygienic and there is hair on the sheets
4. The appearance and lobby of the hotel do not match the room quality and service

feedbackList.content: 抱歉給您帶來不好的入住體驗，CitiGO重視每一位客人提出的意見和建議，感謝您的信任和指正。我們一定會不斷反思和改進，為大家創造更好的入住體驗。
feedbackList.translatedContent: We are sorry to bring you a bad stay experience. CitiGO values every guest's comments and suggestions. Thank you for your trust and correction. We will definitely continue to reflect and improve to create a better stay experience for everyone.

commentList.content: 哇塞！前台小姐姐服務超貼心！服務真好！完美體驗！房間裏全是 超一線進口品牌衛浴！漢斯格雅的淋浴設施！智能家居！被子也是超軟超溫馨。
commentList.translatedContent: wow! The service of the lady at the front desk is super attentive! Great service! Perfect experience! The room is full of super first-line imported brand bathroom! Hansgrohe shower facility! Smart Home! The quilt is also super soft and cozy.

feedbackList.content: 感謝您對CitiGO的信任和喜歡。一個人的朝九晚五，不如一羣人的歡樂場。希望酒店豐富而強大的共享客廳，給您帶來更多美好的體驗，期待您的每一次入住！
feedbackList.translatedContent: Thank you for trusting and liking CitiGO. A person's nine-to-five is not as good as a group of people's joy field. I hope that the rich and powerful shared living room of the hotel will bring you more wonderful experiences and look forward to your every stay!

commentList.content: 酒店前台服務熱情周到，環境好，房間乾淨衛生，免費升級房間，免費贈送咖啡。很喜歡。
commentList.translatedContent: The hotel's front desk service is warm and thoughtful, the environment is good, the rooms are clean and hygienic, free room upgrades, free coffee. like very much.

feedbackList.content: 感謝您選擇北京前門CitiGO歡閣酒店並在此留下您的入住感受，CitiGO位於前門大街112號，周邊小吃眾多，CitiGO是華住酒店集團旗下輕奢、社交品牌,我們致力於將睡眠和沐浴做到極致，在客房採用德國漢斯格雅、杜拉維特的衛浴設備，強大的智能電視等設備確保您的舒適體驗。從洗浴設施到床墊用的都是國際知名品牌，您還可以隨時隨地感受智能客控系統的方便與快捷；我們提倡房間衹是休息的地方，其餘的時間都交給我們的公共區域，在這裏，濃厚的社交氛圍會讓您找到更多興趣相投的朋友，融入狂歡。酒店全體員工非常期待與您的再次相遇，讓我們一起在CitiGO留下最美好的一段回憶！
feedbackList.translatedContent: Thank you for choosing CitiGO Huange Hotel Qianmen Qianmen and leave your stay experience here. CitiGO is located at No. 112 Qianmen Street, and there are many snacks around. CitiGO is a light luxury and social brand under Huazhu Hotel Group. We are committed to combining sleep and bathing. To achieve the ultimate, in the guest room, the bathroom equipment from German Hansgrohe and Duravit, powerful smart TV and other equipment are used to ensure your comfortable experience. From bathing facilities to mattresses, they are all internationally renowned brands. You can also feel the convenience and speed of the intelligent guest control system anytime, anywhere; Here, the strong social atmosphere will allow you to find more like-minded friends and join in the carnival. All the staff of the hotel are very much looking forward to meeting you again. Let's leave the best memories together in CitiGO!

commentList.content: 這個酒店離地鐵非常近，兩分鐘，非常方便！而且離大柵街，天安門都非常近！走路就能到的那種，最主要的是前台服務都很好，我是連住了五天，這裏要誇誇前台有個男生，人好服務好，幾乎有求必應！就管還提供免費可樂和夜宵餛鈍，每天玩的晚回來孩子都要吃一碗說是好吃😋唯一不足就是房間麪積有點小，早餐有點貴，但是畢竟是京城還是能理解的.
commentList.translatedContent: This hotel is very close to the subway, two minutes, very convenient! And it is very close to Dazha Street and Tiananmen Square! The one that can be reached within walking distance. The most important thing is that the service at the front desk is very good. I stayed here for five consecutive days. I want to praise the guy at the front desk. He is very nice and provides good service. He almost responds to every request! Even though it also provides free Coke and night snacks, the children have to eat a bowl every day when they come back from playing late. They say it is delicious. The only downside is that the room is a bit small and the breakfast is a bit expensive, but it is still understandable in Beijing.

feedbackList.content: 感謝您選擇北京天安門廣場CitiGO歡閣酒店並在此留下您的入住感受。酒店的設計和服務都是為了讓我們的客人在旅途中保持舒適的狀態。我們會繼續努力，為每位客人提供更加貼心的服務，期待您的再次入住！
feedbackList.translatedContent: Thank you for choosing CitiGO Hotel Beijing Tiananmen Square and leaving your experience here. The hotel's design and services are all about keeping our guests comfortable during their travels. We will continue to work hard to provide each guest with more considerate service and look forward to your stay again!

commentList.content: 服務特別好  位置棒  很貼心
commentList.translatedContent: The service is very good, the location is great, very considerate

feedbackList.content: 感謝您選擇北京天安門廣場CitiGO歡閣酒店並在此留下您的入住感受。酒店的設計和服務都是為了讓我們的客人在旅途中保持舒適的狀態。我們會繼續努力，為每位客人提供更加貼心的服務，期待您的再次入住！

commentList.content: 前台服務很不錯，環境很不錯

feedbackList.content: 感謝您選擇北京前門CitiGO歡閣酒店並在此留下您的入住感受，CitiGO位於前門大街112號，周邊小吃眾多，CitiGO是華住酒店集團旗下輕奢、社交品牌,我們致力於將睡眠和沐浴做到極致，在客房採用德國漢斯格雅、杜拉維特的衛浴設備，強大的智能電視等設備確保您的舒適體驗。從洗浴設施到床墊用的都是國際知名品牌，您還可以隨時隨地感受智能客控系統的方便與快捷；我們提倡房間衹是休息的地方，其餘的時間都交給我們的公共區域，在這裏，濃厚的社交氛圍會讓您找到更多興趣相投的朋友，融入狂歡。酒店全體員工非常期待與您的再次相遇，讓我們一起在CitiGO留下最美好的一段回憶！

To achieve the ultimate, in the guest room, the bathroom equipment from German Hansgrohe and Duravit, powerful smart TV and other equipment are used to ensure your comfortable experience. commentList.content: 在北京南鑼鼓巷玩也是住在citigo，覺得非常好，去前門大街住也選擇了citigo沒想到差別這麼大。打了前台兩次電話才來給收拾衛生換毛巾。房間有不知道什麼生物被咬了一晚上。
commentList.translatedContent: I also lived in citigo when I was playing in Nanluoguxiang in Beijing, and I thought it was very good. I also chose citigo to live in Qianmen Street, but I did not expect such a big difference. I called the front desk twice before coming to clean up and change towels. The room had been bitten by unknown creatures all night.

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的賓客您好！感謝您選擇天安門廣場CitiGO歡閣酒店並在百忙之中分享了您的入住體驗，非常抱歉沒能給您提供一次完美的入住體驗，您反應的問題酒店非常重視，已通知相關部門進行排查處理，再次對您表示深深的歉意，我們真誠的邀請您再次體驗。您隨時可以聯繫前台，期待您的再次光臨！
feedbackList.translatedContent: Hello, dear guests! Thank you for choosing Tiananmen Square CitiGO Hotel and sharing your check-in experience in spite of your busy schedule. I am very sorry that I failed to provide you with a perfect check-in experience. The hotel attaches great importance to your feedback and has notified the relevant departments to investigate and deal with it , I would like to express my deep apologies to you again, and we sincerely invite you to experience it again. You can contact the front desk at any time and look forward to your visit again!

commentList.content: 交通相當便捷，如果有趕大興機場的航班的建議下榻此店，既可以看盡前門大街的風景又不會因為趕航班耽擱休息的時間。
commentList.translatedContent: The transportation is very convenient. If you have a flight from Daxing Airport, it is recommended to stay here, you can see the scenery of Qianmen Street without delaying the rest time due to the flight.

feedbackList.content: 感謝您選擇北京天安門廣場CitiGO歡閣酒店並在此留下您的入住感受。酒店的設計和服務都是為了讓我們的客人在旅途中保持舒適的狀態。我們會繼續努力，為每位客人提供更加貼心的服務，期待您的再次入住！
feedbackList.translatedContent: Thank you for choosing CitiGO Beijing Tiananmen Square and leave your stay experience here. Hotels are designed and serviced to keep our guests comfortable during their travels. We will continue to work hard to provide more attentive service for each guest, and look forward to your stay again!

commentList.content: 很感謝酒店的用心，在除夕夜和大年初一吃到現包的餃子，很有家的感覺。   酒店位置很好，就在前門大街上，離地鐵7號線、8號線A口很近，100米左右。早上去看升旗很方便，走路15-20分鐘。房間雖然不大，基本夠用，有其他需求，聯繫前台，都可以及時解決。早餐雖然因為疫情原因不開自助，但套餐也很好，標準套餐不夠的話，也可以告知加量。很推薦。
commentList.translatedContent: I am very grateful to the hotel for its diligence. On New Year's Eve and the first day of the new year, I can eat freshly made dumplings, which makes me feel at home. The location of the hotel is very good, just on Qianmen Street, very close to Exit A of Metro Line 7 and Line 8, about 100 meters. It is very convenient to see the flag raising in the morning, it takes 15-20 minutes to walk. Although the room is not big, it is basically enough. If you have other needs, you can contact the front desk and they can be solved in time. Although the breakfast buffet is not open due to the epidemic, the set menu is also very good. If the standard set menu is not enough, you can also tell us to increase the amount. Very recommended.

feedbackList.content: 感謝您對CitiGO的信任和喜歡。一個人的朝九晚五，不如一羣人的歡樂場。希望酒店豐富而強大的共享客廳，給您帶來更多美好的體驗，期待您的每一次入住!
feedbackList.translatedContent: Thank you for trusting and liking CitiGO. A person's nine-to-five is not as good as a group of people's joy field. I hope that the rich and powerful shared living room of the hotel will bring you more wonderful experiences and look forward to your every stay!

commentList.content: 在北京的中心，離開各大景點都非常近，酒店的裝修很新潮，設計很用心，服務員熱心到位。特別是床被都很舒服，就是送的水太小了。其他都不錯，這個價格在北京沒得挑
commentList.translatedContent: In the center of Beijing, it is very close to the major attractions. The decoration of the hotel is very trendy, the design is very attentive, and the staff are enthusiastic. In particular, the beds are very comfortable, but the water provided is too small. Others are good, this price can not be picked in Beijing

feedbackList.content: 感謝您的信任和指正,我們一定會不斷反思和改進，我們會繼續努力，為每位客人提供更加貼心的服務，我們會儘力給您創造更好的入住體驗，期待您的再次入住
feedbackList.translatedContent: Thank you for your trust and correction. We will continue to reflect and improve. We will continue to work hard to provide more attentive service to each guest. We will try our best to create a better stay experience for you and look forward to your stay again.

commentList.content: 位置好，距離天安門，天壇等都非常近，早餐談不上豐富，但是絕對夠吃，味道也很好，服務也很好，以後來還住這家。
commentList.translatedContent: The location is good, very close to Tiananmen Square, Temple of Heaven, etc. The breakfast is not rich, but it is definitely enough, the taste is also very good, and the service is also very good. I will stay here in the future.

feedbackList.content: 感謝您選擇北京天安門廣場CitiGO歡閣酒店並在此留下您的入住感受。酒店的設計和服務都是為了讓我們的客人在旅途中保持舒適的狀態。我們會繼續努力，為每位客人提供更加貼心的服務，期待您的再次入住！

commentList.content:
🍃環境：
酒店非常不錯～床很軟很舒服 還有衛生間的大花灑實在是太爽了

🚗 交通：
交通很方便2號線7號線都很近，就在前門

🔔服務：
服務態度都非常好～
commentList.translatedContent:
🍃 Environment:
The hotel is very good ~ the bed is very soft and comfortable, and the large shower in the bathroom is really cool

🚗 Transportation:
The traffic is very convenient, Line 2 and Line 7 are very close, just at the front door

🔔Service:
The service attitude is very good~

feedbackList.content: 感謝您對CitiGO服務的認可！我們會繼續努力，為每位客人提供更加貼心的服務，期待您的再次入住！
feedbackList.translatedContent: Thank you for your recognition of CitiGO service! We will continue to work hard to provide more attentive service for each guest, and look forward to your stay again!

The room is very exquisite and the service is very good. The front desk staff are friendly and warm and help to upgrade the room for free. Overall very satisfied.

ratingCalculationInfo.title: How ratings are calculated
ratingCalculationInfo.content: To ensure the authenticity of the ratings that are displayed, we don't simply calculate an average. Instead, we make scientific calculations based on the review credibility and the freshness of the guest's experience to get the final rating.
